original_title: 『ひかりふる路（みち） 〜革命家、マクシミリアン・ロベスピエール〜』
overview: The story of the transformational Maximilien Robespierre is of a man fueled by a burning passion for revolutionary ideals that eventually engulfed him in their flames.
title: A Passage Through the Light ~Maximilien Robespierre, the Revolutionary~
